meanings.definition: The abbreviation for physical education classes.
meanings.sent1: In physeds, we learn about staying healthy and active.
meanings.sent2: I have physeds every Monday and Wednesday at school.
meanings.sent3: During physeds, we sometimes play funny games to keep fit.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for physeds is like a bright light in the gym.
meanings.sent5: The joy of physeds fills the room with energy and laughter.

meanings.definition: The plural form of physed, referring to physical education classes.
meanings.sent1: Physeds are important for our overall well-being.
meanings.sent2: We have two physeds each week to improve our fitness.
meanings.sent3: The physeds in our school have the coolest sports equipment.
meanings.sent4: The variety of activities in physeds is a rainbow of fun.
meanings.sent5: The memories made in physeds will last a lifetime.
